title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4022.23 - When hearing held
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4022.23 - When hearing held

State Regulations

Whenever a matter has been referred to the commission
by the stewards that involves an alleged violation by any person of any law or
of any section of this Subchapter, or whenever the commission, on the
commission's own initiative, shall determine to take cognizance of any such
alleged violation or any other matter within the jurisdiction of this
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4022.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
